document_data.caption: A map of the Vast showing the Pass Trail.
document_data.name: Pass Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pass Trail''' ran through [[the Vast]], connecting the villages of [[Tavilar]] and [[Blanaer]]. It linked the [[Hunt Trail]] and the [[Cross Road]].
